text: Pizzo Lucendro is a mountain in the Lepontine Alps, located on the border between the cantons of Uri and Ticino. It overlooks St. Gotthard Pass and Lake Lucendro on its east side. ==References== ==External links== *Pizzo Lucendro on Summitpost Category:Mountains of the Alps Category:Mountains of Ticino Category:Ticino–Uri border Category:Lepontine Alps Category:Mountains of Switzerland
title: Pizzo Lucendro
